titles.title: Removing Our Unsecure Technologies to Ensure Reliability and Security Act
ROUTERS Act
Removing Our Unsecure Technologies to Ensure Reliability and Security Act
ROUTERS Act
Removing Our Unsecure Technologies to Ensure Reliability and Security Act
ROUTERS Act
ROUTERS Act

To direct the Secretary of Commerce, acting through the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information, to conduct a study of the national security risks posed by consumer routers, modems, and devices that combine a modem and router, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 119-75.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 52.

action.text: Mr. Bilirakis moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 866.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Energy and Commerce
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
